short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The 3CX browser extension provides click2call from any website or CRM system for 3CX PBX users.
short.de: Die 3CX-Browser-Erweiterung unterstützt 3CX PBX-Benutzer mit Click2Call von jeder Website und jedem CRM-System.
short.es: La extensión del navegador 3CX proporciona click2call desde cualquier sitio web o sistema CRM para usuarios de PBX 3CX.
short.fr: L'extension navigateur 3CX offre le Click to Call depuis n'importe quel site web ou système CRM pour les utilisateurs du PBX 3CX.
short.it: L'estensione del browser 3CX fornisce click2call da qualsiasi sito Web o sistema CRM per gli utenti 3CX PBX.
short.pl: Wtyczka przeglądarki umożliwia użytkownikom centrali 3CX nawiązywanie połączeń z dowolnej strony lub aplikacji CRM.
short.ru: Расширение для браузера позволяет пользователям 3CX совершать звонки click2call с любого сайта или CRM-системы.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 3CX browser extension provides click2call from any website or CRM system for 3CX PBX users.
With the 3CX extension, Click2Call functionality enables telephone numbers on any webpage or CRM system to be ‘hyperlinked’ allowing a simple click to initiate the call instead of copying and pasting. When setting up the extension, the extension options include the choice for the number to be passed to the 3CX Web Client or 3CX Softphone for Windows. Additionally, included within the settings is an ‘Exclusion list’ where you can set specific URLs in which you do not want the numbers to be ‘hyperlinked’.  

Important: This extension is only for use with 3CX V20, and is not a standalone extension.
